title: p5.js 2.0 with Kit Kuksenok
description: In this livestream, I'm joined by Kit Kuksenok, the p5.js Project Lead from the Processing Foundation! Kit gives an overview of the p5.js 2.0 beta, demonstrating new features like variable fonts, asynchronous loading, text to contours, and 3D text extrusion. We also discuss the timeline for the official release and how the community can get involved and provide feedback.

codeExamples.title: Variable Fonts Demo
codeExamples.description: A p5.js sketch demonstrating the use of variable fonts to animate text weight, one of the new features in version 2.0.

codeExamples.title: Text to Contours and 3D Model Demo
codeExamples.description: This sketch showcases the textToContours() and textToModel() functions for creating 2D and 3D geometry from text.

links.description: Kit is a Berlin-based artist, writer, and coder, and the current p5.js Project Lead.
